name: Rocket (Arugula)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen greens and cruciferous vegetables
High in vitamins A, C, and K
benefits: Rocket (arugula) is a cruciferous green vegetable that provides both greens and cruciferous vegetable benefits. It offers powerful antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds. The peppery flavor adds interest to salads and soups without calories.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - counts toward both greens (2 servings) and cruciferous (1 serving) daily, typically 2 cups coarsely chopped

quotes: GREENS checkbox in Daily Dozen. CRUCIFEROUS VEGETABLES checkbox in Daily Dozen
2 cups/50g coarsely chopped rocket, watercress or mustard greens - Stir in the spinach, rocket, peas and spring onions
